display.title: The Beginning of it All
description: &&o&&7"My adventure starts with some tree punching!? Huh, I thought GregTech was supposed to shake things up a bit..."&&r

If you're familiar with GregTech, you may be aware of its &&cmany nerfs&&r to vanilla recipes. GTCEu does include its fair share - take a look at the crafting recipes for &&eBuckets&&r or &&ePaper&&r. However, we'll ease off the insanity in earlygame, and 1 Log will give you 4 Planks. &&aRejoice!&&r
Here, take this &&6Prospector&&r. You can use it to scan for ores underground - this should give you a small boost.
